mapper.select: select qp.question_id, qp.question_content, qp.question_title, qp.question_date, qp.status, qp.tag1, qp.tag2, mem.lol_account from question_post qp join member mem on mem.email = qp.email order by question_id desc
select qp.*, m.lol_account from question_post qp join member m on qp.email = m.email where status = #{status}
select qp.*, m.lol_account from question_post qp join question_scrape qs on qp.question_id = qs.question_id join member m on qp.email = m.email where qs.email = #{email} order by question_id desc

select qp.*, mem.lol_account from question_post qp join member mem on mem.email = qp.email join question_scrape qs on qp.question_id = qs.question_id where qp.email = #{email} order by question_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into question_post(question_id, question_content, question_title, question_date, email, status, tag1, tag2) value (null, #{question_content}, #{question_title}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{email}, 0, #{tag1}, #{tag2})
insert into question_answer(answer_id, answer_content, answer_date, question_id, answerer_id, answer_status) values (null, #{answer_content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{question_id}, #{answerer_id}, 0)
mapper.select: select qa.answer_content, qa.answer_date, qa.answerer_id, qa.answer_status, mem.lol_account from question_answer qa join member mem on mem.email = qa.answerer_id where question_id = #{question_id}
